name: María Marchita
description:
A collage about 'María' by Café Tacvba, a Mexican band that I admire a lot. Almost thirty years of a wonderful piece where a soul in pain travels the roads of death at night. Or is she death itself?

"It’s Mary who grieves
through the streets
and under a streetlight
she steals kisses and life from people
all while she lies inside a coffin”
